body_html:
'--cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc --copt=/w --verbose_failures --experimental_ui'

The above are all the options we use, and the build at master seems to be healthy for the last week(failures are infra issues):
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-bzl/

@meteorcloudy in case he knows something

PS: the return value, -1073741515 is too random, it looks fishy. Almost like a flaky integer overflow issue about it. Did you retry running?

body:
'--cpu=x64_windows_msvc --host_cpu=x64_windows_msvc --copt=/w --verbose_failures --experimental_ui'

The above are all the options we use, and the build at master seems to be healthy for the last week(failures are infra issues):
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-bzl/

@meteorcloudy in case he knows something


PS: the return value, `-1073741515` is too random, it looks fishy. Almost like a flaky integer overflow issue about it. Did you retry running?
